General.Name: Fidelity Minerals Corp
General.Description: Fidelity Minerals Corp. engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties. It explores for gold, copper, silver, lead, and zinc ores. The company's flagship project is the The Greater Las Huaquillas project comprising 9 concessions that covers an area of 3,800 Ha of contiguous mineral title in which it holds 100% interests; and 9 concessions covering an area of 3,600 Ha in which it holds 50% interests. The company was formerly known as Montan Mining Corp. and changed its name to Fidelity Minerals Corp. in January 2019. Fidelity Minerals Corp. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1166 Alberni Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3Z3
